pitch.cc: Dangerous count for Cliff Lee; Jason Varitek is a dead-red fastball hitter, with a .795 OPS against them this season and .701 against everything else.
Cliff Lee has thrown 91 pitches but has plenty left in the tank, with his fastball sitting at 91 over the past 10 pitches.
